name.description: The name of the project. This is used in the exported project file name.

namespace.description: The namespace used for the project. The namespace 'minecraft' is not a valid string for this field. This will be used in functions such as 'defineBlock'.

packs.description: Stores the list of paths to the project's packs.

.*.description: Path to the pack relative to the config.json.

targets.description: Defines the compiled project output location. The key can be used by the Volar's CLI to specify the target. The value will be the output path.

ignorePaths.description: Defines glob patterns to ignore when compiling the project.
